Class Searches.TranslateCommands

Provides commands for translating text and managing auto-translation settings within a Discord guild.

TranslateCommands(SearchesService, IGoogleApiService)

Provides commands for translating text and managing auto-translation settings within a Discord guild.

Declaration
public TranslateCommands(SearchesService searches, IGoogleApiService google)
Parameters
Type Name Description
SearchesService searches
IGoogleApiService google

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AutoTransLang(string?)

Sets or removes the preferred language pair for auto-translation for the user in the current channel.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoTransLang")]
[Aliases("AutoTransLang")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task AutoTransLang(string? langs = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string langs

The language pair in the format 'from>to', or null to remove the setting.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Users can set their preferred languages for auto-translation in the current channel. To remove the preference, the command can be called without specifying a language pair.

| Edit this page View Source

AutoTranslate(AutoDeleteAutoTranslate)

Toggles auto-translation for the current channel, optionally enabling auto-deletion of the original message.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoTranslate")]
[Aliases("AutoTranslate")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AutoTranslate(Searches.TranslateCommands.AutoDeleteAutoTranslate autoDelete = AutoDeleteAutoTranslate.Nodel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Searches.TranslateCommands.AutoDeleteAutoTranslate autoDelete

Option to auto-delete the original message after translation.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command enables or disables automatic translation of all messages sent in the current channel. If auto-delete is enabled, the original message is deleted after being translated.

| Edit this page View Source

Translangs()

Lists all available languages for translation.

Declaration
[Cmd("Translangs")]
[Aliases("Translangs")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Translangs()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command provides a list of all languages supported by the external translation API, helping users to configure their translation and auto-translation settings correctly.

| Edit this page View Source

Translate(string, string?)

Translates text from one language to another specified by the user.

Declaration
[Cmd("Translate")]
[Aliases("Translate")]
public Task Translate(string langs, string? text = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string langs

The language pair in the format 'from>to'.
string text

The text to be translated.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command uses an external API to translate the provided text from one language to another. The language pair should be specified in the format 'from>to', where 'from' and 'to' are language codes.

Implements

Discord.Commands.IModuleBase
